ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT($Permission.Bypass_Validation_Rule),
CASE(StageName, "Closed Won", 1, "Closed Lost", 1, "Salesforce Correction", 1, 0) < CASE(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName)), "Closed Won", 1, "Closed Lost", 1, "Salesforce Correction", 1, 0) )
